# menu\_grab.gd

**Extends:** [CanvasLayer](../CanvasLayer)

## Description

A layer that is supposed to grab right mouse button clicks
to show the menu

## Method Descriptions

### set\_top

```gdscript
func set_top(top: float)
```

Set the top margin to under the inventory bar
